title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The MRU (Most Recently Used) File List in the File menu does not retain the files between sessions. When opening files, they appear in the MRU list, but after restarting the application, the files no longer appear in the list. It is expected that the MRU list should persist the files between sessions.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Start the workbench. 2. Open 2 or 3 files. 3. Shutdown the workbench. 4. Restart the workbench.
